data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Name a school subject that you think all students should be required to take. How would knowing this subject improve people’s lives?
data.answer: When it comes to a school subject that I think all students should be required to take, I would pick English. The first reason for choosing English to be a compulsory subject in school is that English is one of the most commonly used languages worldwide, and it is the official language of most of the world's most influential countries, such as America and the UK. What's more, globalization has made all countries inextricably linked. This means that it has become far more essential than ever for an individual to master English. Learning English has a number of benefits. Firstly, employment opportunity doors open for those have learnt English. The better employment opportunities in turn have a knock-on effect of higher salaries. English-speaking people are in high demand at global companies. Secondly, English is the official language of the art, and media world. The largest film industry in the world, Hollywood produces films in English. It is always best to appreciate an international work of art in its original language. Learning English will enable viewers to watch them without subtitles. (180字)
